entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming clear before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
